00039 class XALAN_XPATH_EXPORT XStringAllocator

00043     typedef XString         string_type;
00044

00046     typedef ArenaAllocatorType::size_type           size_type;
00047 
00053     XStringAllocator(MemoryManagerType&  theManager, size_type  theBlockCount);
00054 
00055     ~XStringAllocator();
00056 
00064     string_type*
00065     createString(const XalanDOMString&  theString);
00066

00099     bool
00100     ownsObject(const string_type*   theObject)
00101     {
00102         return m_allocator.ownsObject(theObject);
00103     }
00104

00109     reset();
